translation.sql_textarea_label: Text field for your SQL query
translation.no_expected_output_for_task: There is nt expected output for the task

tasks.select_all_invoices: Select the list of all invoices with all their attributes.
tasks.select_all_artists: Select the list of all artists with all their attributes.
tasks.select_all_artists_names: Select the list of all artists' names.
tasks.select_first_and_last_name_of_employees: Select the list of first and last names of all employees.
tasks.select_employees_sorted_by_hire_date_des: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes. Sort the list by hire date in descending order.
tasks.select_first_and_last_name_of_employees_: Select the list of first and last names of all employees. Sort the list by hire date in ascending order.
tasks.select_names_and_length_of_tracks_sorted: Select the list of titles (column name) and length (column milliseconds) of all tracks. Order the list by track title in alphabetical order. For tracks with a same name sort them by length in descending order.
tasks.select_employees_title_support_agent: Select the list of first and last names of all employees with Sales Support Agent title .
tasks.select_tracks_bigger_than_100000000_byte: Select titles of tracks (column name), which size exceeds 100000000 bytes.
tasks.select_tracks_smaller_than_500000_bytes: Select titles of tracks (column name), which size is lower than 500000 bytes.
tasks.select_tracks_between_500000_and_5000000: Select titles of tracks (column name), which size is between 500000 and 5000000 bytes.
tasks.select_employees_before_15_feb_2011: Select the list of hire dates, first and last names of all employees which were hired before 15th February 2011.
tasks.select_employees_last_names_starting_wit: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes, whos names start with an A.
tasks.select_employees_first_names_ending_with: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes, whos nams end with a.
tasks.select_employees_with_address_contains_A: Select the list of all employees with all their attributes, whos billing addresses contain Ave.
tasks.select_invoices_from_canada_ab: Select the list of all invoives with all their attributes, where billing country is Canada and billing state is AB.
tasks.select_invoices_from_nv_reno_with_total_: Select the list of all invoives with all their attributes, where billing state is NV, billing city is Reno and total equals $5.
tasks.select_invoices_from_states_nv_or_ab: Select the list of all invoives with all their attributes, where billing state is NV or AB.
tasks.select_tracks_without_composer: Select the list of all tracks with all their attributes, where composer is not set.
tasks.select_customers_with_company: Select the list of all customers with all their attributes, which have a company set.
tasks.select_invoices_germany_ordered_total_de: Select top-10 invoices by total. Filter the list by country, it have to be equal to Germany. Select all attributes of all invoices.
tasks.select_billing_address_invoices_ca_cuper: Select top-3 invoices by total. Filter the list by billing state to be CA and billing city to be Cupertino. For all invoices select only billing address.
tasks.select_id_invoices_ca_cupertino_or_mount: Select ID of an invoice with lowest total. Its billing state have to be CA and billing city have to be Mountain View or Cupertino.
tasks.count_customers_by_country: Select the list of all countries and amount of customers in each country.
tasks.count_tracks_by_unit_price: Select unit prices and amount of all tracks of each price.
tasks.select_countries_by_customers_desc: Like in previous task, select unit prices and amount of all tracks of each price. Sort the list from highest to lowest price.
tasks.select_top_3_countries_by_customers_desc: Change the previous solution to show only top-3 of prices.
tasks.join_artists_names_and_album_titles: Select all artists names with all their albums titles.
tasks.join_album_titles_and_tracks_titles: Select all album titles and all tracks titles in each album.
tasks.join_artists_names_and_album_titles_orde: Select all artists names and their albums titles. Sort the list by artist name in reverse alphabetical order.
tasks.join_customer_name_and_total_ordered_by_: Select all first and last names of all customers and their invoices totals. Sort the list by total from highest to lowest.
tasks.select_all_aerosmith_albums: Select all albums titles of Aerosmith band.
tasks.select_all_albums_with_midnight_track: Select all albums titles, which contains track with title Midnight.
tasks.select_all_artists_with_midnight_track: Select all artist names, who have track with title Midnight. Remember that you can use JOIN twice or more times.
tasks.count_iron_maiden_albums: Count the number of albums of Iron Maiden band.
tasks.count_each_albums_of_artists: Count the number of albums of each artist.
tasks.artist_with_max_albums: Select the artist with most amount of albums. Find it name and the amount of albums.
tasks.select_top5_clients_with_most_sum_of_inv: Select top-5 customers with higher sum of totals of their invoices.
